title: Charlie Crisp and the Witches of Cobwood
description: Twelve year old Charlie Crisp is about to have his magical destiny activated by a time-bending fur covered Unitor. He's going to need it because he just made the punching bag list of two local bullies - Spats and Knuckles. Enter the world of Cobwood, where talking animals live alongside Witches and Wizards. When a spell goes horribly wrong, Charlie embarks on a unforgettable adventure. An enchanting must-read for children age 8-12 and beyond.Fantasy, Magic, Mid-grade, Adventure
author: L.M.   Young
